Name: NEXT DAY GROUP S.A.
Company description: After 17 years working for different real estate developers and investors in Belgium, France, Italy and Poland, Vittorio Mettewie created Next Day Group in 2016. NDC being the holding of all the Real Estate SPVâ€™s of the group through which the different projects are developed. The projects that the group develops are not only environmental friendly but they also integrate a large number of services to the new acquirers.  These services are going from energy saving warranty, centralized security systems, shared electric bicycles and cars, garden and house maintenance, package reception and concierge services, to home delivery of bio groceries, oven baked bread delivery, diary milk delivery etcâ€¦  Our projects also integrate the latest technologies of green energy production and stockpiling, assuring the entire new quarter being a nearly zero emission living place. Next Day Group delivers all these professional Real Estate services through its subsidiaries not only for its own real estate projects but also to third parties and clients. We are creating new living quarters for a new millennium.

Name: ALEXA Safety & Security
HQ Location: Italy, Gradisca D'isonzo, 46 Via Marziano Ciotti, 34072
Company description: ALEXA s.r.l.s. Safety & Security, on the market since 2014, has as its primary purpose the management of security services private investigations - art. 134 T.U.L.P.S., security officers d.m. 6.10.2009, fire-fighting staff d.m. 10.03.1998, concierge and security training pursuant to Legislative Decree 81/08 and as amended. Alexa, is establishing itself and consolidating itself on the regional territory of Friuli Venezia Giulia for its quality and efficiency of its services. Thanks to its own management team of experts in the field of Investigations, Security and Safety, it has already quickly conquered important realities where it has also implemented innovative security projects. The company also has highly specialized staff according to the various divisions, of Intelligence, Security and Safety, adequately trained and prepared for any type of situation. In fact, in possession of a regular investigative license art. 134 T.u.l.p.s. issued by the Prefecture and Police Headquarters of Gorizia, it provides private investigation services in the civil, insurance and business sectors as well as in the criminal sphere through defensive investigations. in addition, as regards the events and public premises sector, it also has "security services" personnel regularly registered in prefectoral lists and trained in the management of flows and outflows, security controls as well as performing any first public safety tasks to prevent fights and / or public order disorders. Furthermore, especially for events, it has adequately trained personnel through high fire risk workers according to the Ministerial Decree 10.03.1998 and constantly follow refresher courses on the subject. Lastly, in addition to performing classic and simple concierge services, it also has a special section trained "ad hoc" for escorting services with and without a driver, also using luxury cars and large engines for an increasingly demanding clientele.

Name: SKP Global Intelligence
Company description: SKP Global Intelligence S.r.l. is a company specialized in Investigation, Intelligence, and Security services, operating throughout Italy and internationally. Founded in 2004, SKP positions itself as a strategic partner in the management of highly sensitive activities for corporations, government entities, and private clients. SKPâ€™s approach combines legal, investigative, and technological expertise within a structured, effective, and continuously updated operational methodology. The company maintains ongoing collaborations with specialized law firms and industry professionals to ensure high-level legal and technical support, while delivering solutions in full compliance with current regulations. SKP offers a comprehensive range of services, including corporate and private investigations, corporate and competitive intelligence, cybersecurity and electronic countermeasures, travel security, asset protection, and legal, insurance, and defense investigations. It also provides physical security and qualified concierge services, even in high-risk environments. What sets SKP apart is its ability to translate client needs into actionable intelligence, through the collection and validation of strategic information in the investigative and security fields. Over the years, SKP has partnered with leading industrial groups, banking institutions, and governmental organizations, contributing to risk mitigation, the identification of unlawful conduct, and the protection of both tangible and intangible assets. SKP Global Intelligence is your partner in knowledge and protection: a center of excellence against threats, fraud, and injustice, anywhere in the world. Name: Homart | The Property Experts
Company description: In Homart We take good care of your property. Professional Airbnb management, from booking to cleaning. We carefully select properties in excellent locations. We either help you create the best listing, or we fully manage your property in the most professional way.  We are experienced Airbnb hosts for more than 5 years. Being a host can be a complicated task, but we have been there, learned from our mistakes and managed to maximize our bookings and boost our revenues. Trust your property to our expert team and create significant income immediately.  Airbnb is the most successful online tool for short-term rentals in the world. It is totally transparent, secure and effective. Guests love Airbnb, but hosts love it even more. Homart creates the best listings and Airbnb does the rest. We know Airbnb's secrets better than anyone and that's why we are getting paid. Homart manages unique properties in continental Greece and overseas, as long as properties cover specific qualifications. A meeting with our team will explain and reveal all potential opportunities that lie with your property. Areas, such as the Cycladic Islands, Sporades complex, Crete, the Ionian Islands, as well as Peloponnese and Evoia, are destinations of extremely high tourist demand. In â€œRest of Greeceâ€ category, our team offers only the Homart BASIC service. Services Account Creation We create your account, edit the content and pick the best photos, so that your listing increases visibility and attracts more bookings.  Account Management We check prices daily, respond to requests, answer questions and settle bookings. We update your calendar constantly and arrange the scheduling of each booking.  Emergency We are available with 24/7 guest support to give solutions in urgent situations. Key management We will be there to welcome your guests and provide all necessary information, from house instructions to regulations. Professional Cleaning We coordinate cleaning and laundry between stays, with our expert cleaning team.  Payments We collect payments and make sure you are getting paid on time and with full report.  Extra Services Tourist License (EOT) We organize all necessary papers and submit your folder to the Ministry of Tourism, so you can obtain the official tourist license by EOT. Insurance Coverage We arrange for you the insurance of your furniture and belongings, in case of a potential damage. A legitimate insurance company takes over with the minimum cost. Property Valuations Our RICS certified partners will valuate your property for selling or rental purposes. Homart Concierge We will book on your behalf anything you wish to experience right away. Choose among our wide list of recommended restaurants, clubs and bars, sports and leisure activities. We will also organize your private transportation by land, sea and air.  Add the most mesmerizing moments to your holidays and become an ambassador of Greek good life to your friends back home.  Homart Concierge will provide the most sophisticated local tips for customers with exquisite and cosmopolitan tastes.

Our employees have been able to support over 2000 customers over the years and continue to render top-notch immigration services in the field for more. A unique company that works hard on behalf of its clients, offering them all-inclusive immigration services, AtoZ Serwis Plus Sp. z o.o. is Poland's Overseas Career Consultant and presumably Europe's largest B2C immigration firm with Company Registration Number, Region: 382604058, NIP: 5252780856, KRS: 0000770916 supported by Polish lawyers., as well. As we stand for the satisfaction and delight of our customers through impeccable customer service, we are highly recommended and referred by our previous customers to new ones. Name: Pelargos IVF
Company description: Pelargos IVF is a leading fertility clinic specializing in assisted conception and reproductive health. We provide a wide range of personalized, all-inclusive, and holistic services, including: - In Vitro Fertilization (IVF) - Egg Donation - Surrogacy - Egg Freezing - Preimplantation Genetic Testing (PGT-A) Our multidisciplinary team of doctors and paramedics collaborates with the top embryology labs in Athens, ensuring the highest standards of care. We are dedicated to enhancing patient satisfaction and improving success rates through cutting-edge treatments and personalized care. For international patients, we offer complimentary concierge services in partnership with Elixir Medical Concierge, making cross-border IVF treatments in Athens seamless and stress-free. In addition to fertility treatments, we provide advanced aesthetic gynecology services at our Kolonaki headquarters and offer high-end private obstetrics and gynecological endoscopic surgery at state-of-the-art day surgery units. At Pelargos IVF, we are committed to helping our patients achieve their dreams of parenthood with compassion, expertise, and innovation.

We make going to the dentist a positive experience with our caring and gentle practitioners and you get the benefit of enjoying a beautiful European vacation.  Come to Lisbon, enjoy the trip of your dreams with your beautiful new smile.

Name: Vizu
HQ Location: Spain, Madrid, Madrid, 112 Calle Del General PardiÃ±as
Company description: Work hard, play hard, right? Then why does "play hard" often seem to involve so much work? Because if you want to have a great experience, you have to work hard to curate that experience. Vizu strives to make "work" and "play" mutually exclusive, indefinitely. Put simply, we want to make your social life easier. Without the noise. Without frustration. With intelligence. So, how do you curate these great experiences? First, maybe, you ask your significant other what they want to do. Then your friend group. Then some co-workers or classmates. Next, you count the number of "I'm down for whatever"-s and roll your eyes. Maybe you're "down for whatever" too, but what the f*ck does that even mean? Then, while you're getting that 3pm coffee to get you through the final work hours of the day, you faintly hear the words "tiki bar" from the back of the room and BOOM! Inception. It's going down.  But where is this so-called tiki bar? How is the music? Is there music at all? Can I roll through with all 8 of my friends? Do I need to reserve? Where should I go before? And what about after? Is there going to be a line out the door around the corner? The questions roll in. But who has the answers? Maria. How on earth did you forget to ask Maria? She knows all the hot spots. She knows my vibe. She knows what I like. She's always known best. She even goes the extra mile and make the reservation for you, puts you in contact with her friend who used to work the door. She's got the inside scoop. Here comes the zinger: Maria isn't a person. She's your artificially intelligent concierge for your social life on Vizu. Just ask, she'll do the hard work for you.

Name: Dream Links
Company description: There are approx 35,000 golf courses in the World but only 246 are true links courses. Six of these form the Sligo Links Swing, a  wonderful cluster of Links Golf along a majestic stretch of the Wild Atlantic Way Coastline in the North West of Ireland.   They are located on stunning stretches of coastline, nestled amongst magnificent sand dunes and with fairways of fine textured, tight turf for which links courses famed. Our mission in Dream Links is to help you discover the joy of Links golf in this part of the world and to enjoy the unique links experience during your time. 1. WE PLAN YOUR EXPERIENCE We plan your trip of golf and can provide a challenge match against  local members. Included in the plan are non golfing activities such as Catch and Cook boat trip around Sligo Bay. 2. WE SCHEDULE AND ORGANISE YOUR EXPERIENCE  We schedule it to meet your requirements and we schedule each element of the trip. 3. WE MAKE IT HAPPEN We operate a luxury concierge service from the minute you land untill you leave.

Indiferent de orasul in care plecati, noi va putem ajuta cu: - bilete la muzeele si expozitiile din oras din perioada calatoriei - rezervari la cele mai cautate restaurante pentru pranz sau cina - bilete la concertele, evenimentele sportive si culturale din oras din perioada calatoriei - excursii si tururi locale pentru a experimenta destinatia - bilete la teatre, muzicaluri si spectacole locale - servicii de transport:  inchirieri de masini si transferuri private - bilete de intrare la parcurile de distractie si atractiile regiunii - rezervari hoteliere conform criteriilor dumneavoastra Este foarte simplu sa aveti un Concierge personal de la Travel Studio!

Fine Living Services is the oldest and largest concierge company in Greece offering unique lifestyle management & bespoke luxury services to VIPs and High Net Worth Individuals. The company was founded by specialists in the VIP Pampering Business in Greece & Worldwide, in order to address the demand for tailor-made travel and concierge services. Luxury tourism is a new, upcoming sector in Greece and there are only a handful of companies that possess the appropriate resources and expertise to handle VIP planning & luxury event management services. Our company currently operates through our offices in Greece, United Kingdom and Monaco. Our head office is located at 51 Souidias Street, Kolonaki, next to the historical centre of Athens.

Name: HPC Group
Company description: HPC is the international family office of SAP founder Prof. Dr. Hasso Plattner. In this function, the HPC Group - with its offices in Potsdam, San Francisco and Cape Town - provides a wide range of services, from asset management to private concierge services, to the Plattner family. Through the Hasso Plattner Foundation, HPC oversees inter alia the renowned Hasso Plattner Institute and Museum Barberini in Potsdam. Hasso Plattner has recently been awarded the prestigious Werner-von-Siemens-Ring. Since 1916, the foundation of the same name honors the life achievement of important engineers. The jury's verdict for one of the most important German scientific and technical awards states: "As the founder of SAP, Hasso Plattner had a decisive influence on Germany as a business location and repeatedly built bridges with a wealth of ideas - between science and research, industry and politics."

Company description: Valerie and Paul both worked long hours as consultants and when they had their two boys things started to pile up at home. Name: I-frontdesk
Company description: i-frontdesk is a young and promising start-up based in Munich, Germany. The idea of installing a multilingual virtual concierge on a touch tablet screen for every hotel room was the experience-outcome of the CEO and co-founder, Dorna Hekmat, managing a Boutique Hotel without a concierge for several years. The necessity of solving the problem and fact of the increasing trend of hotels practically rationalizing away "the heart of the hotel" in other words the position of THE CONCIERGE brought up this solution. Also hotels with an existing concierge can very well use this system in order to optimise the internal processes and level of service for their guests. With the support of three friends, profoundly experienced in mobile connectivity solutions and strong entrepreneurial skills, she managed to set up i-frontdesk and be one of the nine winners of the Telefonica incubator "Wayra" Germany in August 2012! Our vision is to make it possible for every progressive hotel providing their guests with a tablet device beside the bible on the desk welcoming them in their room and making their stay as pleasant and exciting as possible. Some press coverage so far: http://de.wayra.org/de/startup/i-frontdesk http://de.wayra.org/de/wayraweek/deutschland-2012 http://www.crn.de/netzwerke-tk/artikel-96521.html http://venturevillage.eu/tag/ifrontdesk/ http://www.focus.de/finanzen/news/wayra-finanziert-start-ups-in-serie-telefonica-macht-maechtig-wind...

Name: Productionhotel.com
HQ Location: Denmark, Capital Region, Copenhagen, 10 Hauser Plads, 1127
Company description: Productionhotel is a travel company that provides services to the production industry. Common for all production companies is the need for hotel rooms on a irregular basis, one year you might have none - other years maybe 200, depending on the amount of activities that specific year. Hotels will often have a hard time giving a consistent low price on that basis.  Productionhotel collects the room nights from all companies to even out the difference in room night production from year to year. This way production companies will gain the volume benefits from each other and get a consistent low price yearly.  Productionhotel will not make hotel agreement with all hotels, as the price and advantages will level out as the number of hotels increase. Productionhotel have selected hotels that are preferred by production companies and has a proven track record.  Furthermore Productionhotel will focus on the following criteriaâ€™s for choosing hotels: â€¢	Price & conditions (Minimum block-out dates, late CXL policies) â€¢	Quality (best hotels within category; 5/4/3 star and apartment hotels) â€¢	Logistic position (convenience to; city center, parking, infrastructure) â€¢	Easy and flexible booking Besides giving production companies the free value of the above we offer services for a booking fee including:  -	Concierge services such as; airport pickup and drop of service, restaurant booking, car rental, sightseeing, welcome package in rooms and much more â€“ your wish is our command!

Name: Consorzio Leonardo Servizi E Lavori - Stable Consortium Cooperative Society
HQ Location: Italy, Tuscany, Pistoia, 2 Via Degli Orafi, 51100
Company description: The Consorzio Leonardo Servizi (today Consorzio Leonardo Servizi e Lavori - CLSL) was established on 5 August 2004 with the aim of aggregating the experience and professionalism of companies operating in the "soft" service sector (cleaning, porterage, concierge) in order to offer the market the global service activity to these referred. Since 2011, the Consortium has expanded its offer by virtue of the entry into the consortium of new companies belonging to the construction and maintenance sector. The primary purpose for which it was set up, therefore, is to grow its companies both from an economic and a technical point of view. In fact, the CLSL has a common business organization that coordinates the activities of the consortium members, promoting their development and rationalization; these activities (services, works and supplies) are entrusted and therefore carried out by the consortium members themselves without resorting to subcontracting and use. To improve coordination and control, the Consortium has obtained ISO 9001 certification in order to ensure maximum reliability and professionalism in the execution of the works, in the provision of services and supplies. Starting from February 2013, adapting to the regulations laid down by Legislative Decree 163/2006 art. 36 "stable consortia" and in accordance with the provisions of law 207/2010, has assumed the status of Consortium Stable, thus obtaining the SOA certification issued by SOA MEDITERRANEA Spa and since March 2018 it has become a Stable Consortium Cooperative, attesting with ESNA-SOA. The Consortium makes it possible to minimize the use of subcontracting thus offering services, works and supplies at costs that exclude additional percentages for "general contractor" and therefore refer entirely to the activity.
